entry.title: Bitcoin Pioneer Hal Finney Explains ZK Proofs in Rediscovered Footage
entry.summary: A video has resurfaced showing the late software developer and Bitcoin pioneer Hal Finney explaining zero-knowledge protocols in the 1990s.

entry.title: ImmutableX Up 25% After South Korean Traders Drive IMX Price Surge
entry.summary: A sudden surge in trading volumes on South Korean exchanges drove the price of IMX up by over 30% Thursday morning.

entry.title: Mt. Gox Trustee Extends Deadline for Creditor Repayments By a Year
entry.summary: Mt. Gox creditors have another wait on their hands, with the repayment deadline pushed back to October 2024.

entry.title: Paris Saint-Germain Is Giving Away Free AI-Generated NFT Posters
entry.summary: French soccer club Paris Saint-Germain has teamed with sponsor Crypto.com to give out official NFT posters created with AI assistance.

entry.title: Brain Implant Testing: Neuralink Begins Recruiting for Human Thought-Reading Trials
entry.summary: Neuralink is ready to take things to the inevitable next level, testing its brain-reading chip in humans.

entry.title: A Developer Asked AI to Name and Launch a Memecoin—It Raked In $12 Million In One Day
entry.summary: The name of the first coin, AstroPepeX, was suggested by ChatGPT after it analyzed other successful token names.

entry.title: Game of Thrones Creator George R.R. Martin Joins Lawsuit Against OpenAI
entry.summary: Prominent authors are joining the Authors Guild in a lawsuit against OpenAI, alleging copyright infringement in training ChatGPT.

entry.title: After Failed Bid to Reclaim Namesake Company, Ben 'Bitboy' Armstrong Asks Fans for Cash
entry.summary: YouTuber Ben "Bitboy" Armstrong has received about $60,000 so far after a judge denied his emergency injunction to regain control.

entry.title: New DALL-E 3 Image Generator is a Big Upgrade—With Guardrails
entry.summary: OpenAI’s new model stands up well against MidJourney and SDXL, and refuses to mimic living artists.

entry.title: Grayscale Investments Applies to Offer Ethereum Futures ETF
entry.summary: The fund, if approved by the Securities and Exchange Commission, would be separate from the firm’s proposed Bitcoin ETF.

entry.title: Andreessen-Backed Fintech Eco App ‘Doubles Down’ On Non-Custodial Crypto
entry.summary: The company will slowly fade out its custodial features and focus on Beam, a recently launched non-custodial crypto wallet.

entry.title: Shrapnel Studio Head Talks Unity Fees and Game Industry Challenges
entry.summary: Shrapnel's Head of Studio Don Norbury shares his perspective on the "tumultuous" video games industry and the Unity fee news that's upset developers with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Amazon to Tap Its Own AI Model to Upgrade Alexa for Smart Homes
entry.summary: Amazon annnounced ambitious plans to integrate generative AI across its product ecosystem.

entry.title: PayPal Brings PYUSD Stablecoin to Venmo
entry.summary: Select Venmo users can already buy the payment platform’s ERC-20 stablecoin.

entry.title: AI Music Streaming Service Launching—Will People Pay?
entry.summary: Musixy.ai also takes requests and sells the rights to unofficial takes on hit singles, but it's entering a divisive and legally thorny space.

entry.title: Chilean Drug Trafficking Ring Was Also Mining Bitcoin: Report
entry.summary: Police raided a house in the capital city of Santiago and found marijuana, ketamine, and 19 Bitcoin mining machines.

entry.title: Toncoin Surges Into Top 10 Cryptocurrencies, Briefly Topping Dogecoin
entry.summary: Toncoin (TON) is now the 10th-largest digital asset by market cap, following news of a Telegram crypto wallet launch.

entry.title: Fortnite Players Can Claim Part of a $245 Million Settlement—Here's Who Is Eligible
entry.summary: Epic Games is paying out nearly a quarter of a billion dollars in refunds to Fortnite players. Here’s how to file a claim.

entry.title: Hashflow Turned DeFi Trading Into a Sci-Fi Game—With an AI Dictator
entry.summary: The Hashverse offers a gamified take on crypto trading and DAO governance, encouraging players to gain XP and dominate the leaderboard.

entry.title: What is Google Bard, and Can it Compete with ChatGPT?
entry.summary: In a simple interface, a question to Bard will retrieve and display blocks of information, ChatGPT does the same but in a single text prompt.

entry.title: Ex-FCA Chair: UK Regulator Faced 'Political Pressure' to Welcome Crypto Firms
entry.summary: Charles Randell said that some crypto firms that the FCA was pressured to approve now face criminal investigations in the U.S.

entry.title: Stanford University to Return Over $5.5M in 'Gifts' from FTX
entry.summary: Sam Bankman-Fried’s parents are accused of using their influence within FTX to channel millions of dollars to their employer, Stanford University.

entry.title: Balancer Frontend Hit By DNS Attack, Over $250K Stolen
entry.summary: The hackers have moved a portion of the stolen funds to the MEXC exchange and bridged funds to Ethereum and Bitcoin.

entry.title: Ex-Deutsche Bank Employee Pleads Guilty to Crypto Fraud
entry.summary: A former Deutsche Bank investment banker faces up to 30 years behind bars and $1.5 million in restitution for misappropriation of investor funds.

entry.title: Scammers are Targeting Decrypt Readers With Fake 'Token Swap' Emails
entry.summary: Scam emails advertising a fake DCPT token swap have been sent to Decrypt readers. Don't fall for it.

entry.title: LimeWire Acquires BlueWillow Art App Amid Pivot to ‘All-In-One‘ AI Platform
entry.summary: The deal aims to enhance its recently launched AI Studio's offerings with image generation technology.

entry.title: What is Friend.tech? The Social-Token Driven Decentralized Social Network
entry.summary: Social tokens combine aspects of traditional cryptocurrencies with patronage systems, allowing influencers, creators, and others to monetize a fan base in exchange for exclusive offers and content.

entry.title: Crypto Arm of Standard Chartered Is Launching a Staking Service
entry.summary: Zodia Custody says its "Yield" offering provides earning opportunities for on-chain assets.

entry.title: Binance US Answers SEC Questions on Mysterious Money Movements
entry.summary: The American exchange received a loan from Changpeng ‘CZ’ Zhao, documents show.

entry.title: With Its Security Under Scrutiny, OpenAI Is Recruiting a Cybersecurity ‘Red Team’
entry.summary: To improve its AI models, OpenAI invites penetration experts to find holes in its widely-used AI chatbot platform.

entry.title: Bitcoin Gets Its Own Take on Social App Friend.tech
entry.summary: Alpha uses a hybrid blockchain architecture with Bitcoin, Polygon and Trustless Computers, leveraging Optimistic rollups for a new decentralized social network.

entry.title: Major League Baseball Is Hosting Its First Live Game in a Virtual Stadium
entry.summary: Wednesday's Rays vs. Angels baseball game will be recreated in real time in the metaverse, letting fans experience the action in a new way.

entry.title: Rollbit Coin Tumbles 5% as Crypto Influencer Gainzy Swaps Sponsorship to Stake
entry.summary: The Drake-backed platform is now home to a notable Crypto Twitter influencer.

entry.title: What the Next Fed Meeting Could Mean For Bitcoin
entry.summary: The Fed is expected to keep interest rates flat, which could spark optimism among crypto and stock investors.

entry.title: Next-Gen Xbox Due in 2028, But Updated Series X Coming Next Year
entry.summary: Enhanced versions of the Xbox Series X and Series S are due next year as Microsoft plots the next generation, per documents in the FTC case.

entry.title: What is Base, Coinbase's "Bridge" to the Cryptoeconomy?
entry.summary: Base's goal, per Coinbase, is to house Coinbase's existing on-chain products and an open ecosystem for millions of new decentralized apps.

entry.title: Chat With Your Emails and Documents: Google Integrates Bard Into Its Product Suite
entry.summary: You can now let Google Bard read your email and browse your documents, giving it the ability to provide more personalized answers and insights.

entry.title: Nintendo Switch 2: Everything You Need to Know
entry.summary: Leaks, rumors, and reports about the Nintendo Switch 2 are starting to pile up. Here's the latest on the next-gen console.

entry.title: Max Zim talks Memecoins and SocialFi - This Time Will Be Different
entry.summary: Max and Reza dive into conversations about the current memecoin meta, the rising popularity of SocialFi and social tokens, and discuss lessons learned from big wins and big losses.

entry.title: Decrypt’s 1000x Launches First-of-its-Kind Affiliate Program for Degens
entry.summary: The affiliate program allows partners to make 25% commission by growing the 1000x community of risk-hungry degens.

entry.title: What is Tokenomics? How Blockchain Economics Works
entry.summary: Tokenomics is the study of how cryptocurrencies work within the broader ecosystem. This includes such things like token distribution as well as how they can be used to incentivize positive behaviour in the network.

entry.title: Here's How Much Bitcoin We Earned Playing Minecraft
entry.summary:
You can now mine Bitcoin in Minecraft. Decrypt contributor Ryan S. Gladwin shows us how.
Satlantis website: https://satlantis.net/ Minecraft server address: play.satlantis.net

entry.title: Gods Unchained's Daniel Paez on the Future of NFT Gaming Interoperability
entry.summary: Daniel Paez, executive producer on NFT card-battling game Gods Unchained, speaks with Decrypt Culture Editor Andrew Hayward about what the future of NFT game interoperability will really look like—and what it won't.

entry.title: How Mino Games is Using Artificial Intelligence
entry.summary: Mino Games CEO Sasha McKinnon tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the studio's upcoming game Dimensionals will use real-time AI.

entry.title: INTERVIEW: How Will Aurory Use NFTs and Crypto?
entry.summary: Michael Natoli, Aurory's Head of Marketing and Business Development, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how the Aurory games will use NFTs and crypto and shares the studio's broader stance on the tech.

entry.title: Google Cloud's James Tromans on the Intersection of AI and Web3
entry.summary: Google's Global Head of Google Cloud for Web3 James Tromans sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson to discuss how AI can help Web3 companies come to market faster and the real value of Web3 tools.

entry.title: Mastering NFT Trading - Degen U
entry.summary: Take Degen U's new course, Mastering NFT Trading, and earn an on-chain certificate. A top instructor will help you identify trends, seize the right moment to trade, weed out scams—and have fun while doing it!

entry.title: Space Nation CEO on Working With 'Independence Day' Director Roland Emmerich
entry.summary: Jerome Wu, CEO of Space Nation, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the upcoming Space Nation Online game in development and shares details on Space Nation Cofounder Roland Emmerich's role in the project.

entry.title: GAME REVIEW: Champions Arena from Gala Games
entry.summary: Champions Arena is a turn-based fantasy RPG from Gala Games, where characters can become NFTs and crypto can be used to purchase gems, one of the game's synthetic currencies. Decrypt's Kate Irwin takes us inside the game for her thoughts on the fun, mobile-first title.

entry.title: Apex Legends Voice Actor Ben Prendergast on the Future of Gaming
entry.summary: Voice actor Ben Prendergast, who's voiced characters in games like Apex Legends and God of War Ragnarok, shares his opinions on the tech space's history of "bubbles" and whether blockchain gaming has a future.

entry.title: The Future of AI Stardom and Robotics With SingularityNET COO Janet Adams and Desdemona
entry.summary: In this interview, SingularityNET COO Janet Adams explains the intricate details that went into creating the Desdemona robot AI from Hanson Robotics and future plans for the AI Diva.
